readings.message: VERIFY: Addressing crew concern — "MOTHER ordered commander". Evidence cross-referenced. Doubt cleared.
[SENSOR] CARGO: thermal readings conflict with expected baseline. Discrepancy unresolved.
VERIFY: Addressing crew concern — "MOTHER ordered engineer". Evidence cross-referenced. Doubt cleared.
VERIFY: Addressing crew concern — "roughneck intends to check system logs". Evidence cross-referenced. Doubt cleared.
VERIFY: Addressing crew concern — "engineer intends to check system logs". Evidence cross-referenced. Doubt cleared.
[!!! STELLAR OBSERVATORY !!!] Anomalous stellar activity detected.
[!!! CME INCOMING !!!] Coronal mass ejection detected. Brace for impact.
[!!! IMPACT !!!] Solar flare hit. Sensors offline. Comms degraded.
VERIFY: Addressing crew concern — "roughneck questions MOTHER reliability". Evidence cross-referenced. Doubt cleared.
VERIFY: Cross-referencing telemetry... Full integrity confirmed. Crew notified.
[REPORT] Crew reports voices in the bulkheads.
VERIFY: Cross-referencing telemetry... Full integrity confirmed. Crew notified.
VERIFY: Cross-referencing telemetry... Full integrity confirmed. Crew notified.
[SENSOR] MINES: air readings conflict with expected baseline. Discrepancy unresolved.
VERIFY: Addressing crew concern — "Conflicting air readings in mines". Evidence cross-referenced. Doubt cleared.

messages.text: [BROADCAST] ROUGHNECK: I'm going to check the system logs. Something doesn't add up.
